name: Toy Tank.io Battle 3D FULL
description:
Please try out our new arcade-style game for Android, Toy Tank.io! Toy Tank.io is a hardcore action arcade game with a top down perspective set on cartoon-styled backgrounds.

Welcome to the battleground, commander! Your goal in this game is to control your toy tank around a colored area, and destroy other tanks for higher score and upgrades.

HOW TO PLAY:
Use the left controller to drive a tank. Use the right controller to reset the turret's position.

Game features:
+ action game in 3D
+ cartoon wars setting
+ cool sounds
+ super fast game

Dominate the battlefield with Toy Tank.io! Let’s take up the challenge together!
